attributes.action: Council tax to be void if the country becomes on a lockdown due to Coronavirus.
attributes.additional_details: The government response to Coronavirus has been inadequate and has left a lot of people in a state of panic and a lack of confidence.
attributes.background:
Government to help and support families more if jobs are lost or people are made redundant. 
Council tax should be redecuded to help families and individuals.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
